100 things about me

mirror, pictures, posters, hooks with clothes hanging from them

anything! pop/rock/soul/blues/jazz/reggae/rnb/hip hop

25. The person who most likely to repost this: the next random who reads it on PAN

Girls

OK, usually us girls are always writin up blogs about scummy blokes. Well I'm changin it up a bit. Seriously, some of the girls on here, it is absolutely impossible to show them a shred of respect. Even the mothers on here, I mean, come on, you're a mother now, surely going through that would give you an ounce of self respect for yourself & would make you expect some from others as well.

You make it hard for us girls who are ladies. And let's face it, you gotta act like a lady to be treated like a lady. And if u post up pics of you in ur underwear, well, ur just asking for sleazy attention. I think you gotta be pretty desperate to not only accept that kind of attention, but actually seek it out. Naturally, everyone likes to be complimented. But I prefer a comment like 'you have a beautiful smile' rather than 'nice boobs'.

So girls, put ya clothes back on & stop promoting the idea that all us females are bimbos & whores.

New Music

Hey all, as some of you know I'm in a band 'The Huntsmen'. Well, we've been recording lately, & just uploaded demos of some of the latest stuff to myspace, so click n have a listen! The songs are really close to my heart, so yeah, I'm really proud of them. If you've got myspace, feel free to add us Peace out, Aniesha

www.myspace.com/thehuntsmen

Happy

Yeah, I'm happy. As a lot of ppl know, I haven't been really happy in quite a while. My life got majorly screwed up, but everything is looking like sunshine at the moment I think my end of the tunnel is getting closer, much closer. *happy relieved sigh*

So yeah

Why is it so hard to know what ppl think? I'm so totally lost atm. Mostly I'm usually pretty good at reading ppl & what they're thinking, but I'm so totally in the dark & confused................I hate it, lol. Apparently it's good for me, or so I've been told.

It's not in a bad way though, so yeah, it's OK, just hmmm, I'm not really making much sense, so I might stop now.

Music Oz Awards!!!

OK pplz, so here I am again to promote some awesome music

Glen & I are up on the Music Oz site, & we need all you beautiful ppl to vote for us in the ppl's choice awards...............you could even win a guitar by voting. So here are the links where you can listen to our songs & it has the info on how to vote there.

It only takes a couple of minutes, so plz check it out! Peace, Aniesha

ANIESHA

http://www.musicoz.org/songs/artist_profile.aspx?artistID=1482&letter=&artistcatID=0&catID=0&field=artistname&keyword=aniesha%20hunt&page=0&songID=0&fromsearch=1

LIFE

Life is crazy man. Awhile back I didn't want to carry on living, it was so bad. Everything hurt, & just to breathe was agony.

Now....................wow, what can I say. My life has totally turned around. I have so many good things happening for me.

*I'm really gettting back into being creative musically, & it feels so good. I'm loving the new songs that we're working on, the band's sound is really getting to where we want it to be.

*I decided to pursue acting & modelling like I have for a long time, but never had the guts to go for it. Now I have, & the results are awesome. I've just been signed by an agency, & have a photo shoot coming up this weekend hopefuly, I'm so excited!

*I've met a guy.
No, we're not dating or anything, & nothing has happened, but he makes me happy. We can talk for hours & it feels like minutes. He makes me smile & laugh, & I just really enjoy his company.

I'm happy. Really happy

I'm Baaaaack!!!

So, have ya'll missed me? lol.

I was offline for a few days, dodo internet was messin us around something shocking, but I'm back now & the shakes have gone away hahahahaha.

I had my photo shoot on Friday, it went awesome, it was so much fun! So yeah, I will be uploading some of my faves from that tonight or soonish.

Is my Dad's birthday today, so been cookin up a big feed today.............I love birthdays, get to eat stacks & not feel too guilty, lol.

And I'm off to Stradbroke this coming weekend for the Island Times festival, is gonna be mad as, I'm really lookin fwd to it. Plus a certain someone gonna be there, so yeah, we'll see how that goes, lol.

Anywayz, peace out all, hope yas all goin good.

blah blah blah

My back is sore. I've been on the end of a stinkin shovel, pick, & rake this morning, digging out dirt so we can cement there.

That doesn't really bother me that much tho, I don't mind a bit of hard work, it's more ppl that are getting to me atm. Supposedly the older you get, the wiser you get, but I can blow that theory out the window.

So yeah, there's my whinge for the day.

On the positive side, I'm off to Stradbroke this weekend for the Island Times Festival, so I'm really looking fwd to that. Specially just to get away from the dramas that I'm mixed up in atm, just to get away from it all & chill out.

Hope everyone is havin a good day. Peace out, Aniesha

December Update

Hi All, I haven't really been online much these last couple of months, so thought I'd update ya'll on my life

Everything is going wonderfully for me, I'm just so happy. My man is the most beautiful man in the world, he treats me so well, & looks after me, & makes me smile & laugh, & give me more love & affection than I've ever known before.

My family are all going well. My cousin is due to have her first baby any day soon, so that's exciting, another new addition to the Hunt family!

James & I went to see Joss Stone last week, it was mad as. She was awesome, & the band was so tight! And we went to the Carols in the City Saturday night with the fam, I really enjoyed that...Guy Sebastian was there and he was brilliant as always

I'm really looking fwd to Christmas hey, is gonna be a good one. Then right after that I'm off to the Woodford Folk Festival with Jimmy, can't wait for that!

Aight pplz, well I'ma sign off now, but Merry Christmas to all, stay safe, & have a great time. Peace & luv, Aniesha

SORRY

Wow, I can't believe that it has finally happened. Just for the Australian government to acknowledge the wrong that was done to our people is a massive step in my eyes. And I think what's great too though is that it's not going to end just here with words. A huge step forward for Australia I believe.

On a more negative note, what about that stinkin opposition leader. He wasn't friggen sorry for anything, he couldn't give a damn about Aboriginal people or the issues surrounding us. He tiptoed around the cold hard truth, whereas I really admired Kevin Rudd for not dong that at all.....he was straight up with it all, as ugly as it is. And that Brendan Nelson fulla talkin about the children who have been sexually abused like it's all blackfullas doing it. Made me angry ay.

But yeah, gotta finish off positive. Sorry has finally been said after countless years of our people struggling for recognition, & I think it's great day. Let's hope that Kevin lives up to the rest of his promises, but I feel optimistic considering that start that he's made already.

Peace out ppl, Niesha

Update on my life, March '08

Yo pplz, what's new? Just thought I'd give yas all a lil update on my life, seeing as I'm never here anymore. Well, James & I have our own place now, we moved in last month, & it's just great We were pretty much just living out of our parent's places before that, & doing a lot of travelling bk n forth, so is a real relief to have a place of our own now. And yeah, my first time livin in the big smoke ay! Bit of a change, but it's all good.

Not doin the band thing anymore, but I've got a job teaching keyboard at a music school, which is going really good so far, & have also got some solo gigs comin up. Was supposed to gig last night, but I came down with a cold monday, so I was pretty cut that I had to cancel last night. However, if anyone out there in Brissie has nothing exciting to do on a Tuesday night, come down to Kaliber! (shameless plug I know). Anywayz, Kaliber is in the Brunswick St Mall, right next door to Ric's, and Jimmy & I shall be there every tues night from about 8-ish........so yah, would love to see some of you pan.netpeeps there!

Hmm, what else is new? Can't think of anything atm. I'm feeling pretty miserable at from this damn cold, have my lil box of tissues beside me in the library here, so I'm looking fwd to going home to bed. Actually, I think I might just go & do that now. So peace out pplz, hope you guys are all going well, & one day I'll have the net back & be able to come back on here again!

The arrival of my son Mone James

Quick blog to the pan.networld to announce the birth of my beautiful little son 'Mone James Hunt-Feagai', born 20th Dec 2008 @ 12:57am. He's happy & healthy, & the most perfect little angel ever Will upload some pics shortly to show off to the world how gorgeous he is Being a Mummy keeps me very busy these days, but I'm loving every bit of it. Plus lil Bubba has the best Daddy in the world, who makes life very easy on the both of us. Feeling very blessed. Peace out, Aniesha
